meta.description: Optimize the number of tests performed in a clinic with time constraints and test type requirements.

sets.name: TEST_TYPES
sets.description: Types of tests performed at the clinic.

params.name: time_per_test
params.description: Time in minutes required to perform each type of test.

params.name: total_time_available
params.description: Total time available for performing tests in minutes.

vars.name: num_tests
vars.description: Number of tests performed for each type.

objective.name: max_total_tests
objective.description: Maximize the total number of tests performed.

constraints.name: time_constraint
constraints.description: Total time used by tests must not exceed available time.

constraints.name: blood_to_ear_ratio
constraints.description: At least three times as many blood tests as ear tests must be performed.

constraints.name: min_ear_tests
constraints.description: At least 12 ear tests must be administered.
